name: International Software Technologies
overview:
Founded in 1985, IST has over 20 years of technology expertise strictly focused on improving the day-to-day operations performed within the education industry. Developing comprehensive, collaborative and efficient solutions enabling students, educators and parents the ability to optimize their time and focus on what is truly important, helping our future â€“ our children thrive.

IST is very customer centric, thus we carefully consider each customerâ€™s feedback, particularly when managing localized requirements, when enhancing our solution set. Our customers are our success; therefore we are closely involved during implementation and maintain that level of attention throughout the lifetime of each relationship. In order to better serve our customers, IST regularly confers with a broad professional partner network on the topics of technology, security and administration, ensuring the highest level of quality products and services are maintained.

Their Mission
To improve the way educators, parents, and students manage their daily administrative tasks, so that they may spend their time in more thought provoking and awe inspiring activities.
